text: Autoplay video won't work on mobile it's a browser config that mobile have. For mobile to autoplay video they have to be muted. See full article for more info : <https://www.squarebird.co.uk/why-wont-video-autoplay-on-mobile/>

<@U0682QW2QN7> I used the muted and playsinline attributes and still nothin :/ do you happen to know what an ideal file size would be ? Maybe it’s a size issue ? Or would it be better if we exported this as a gif instead ?

Sorry for the delay, sure thing size could be the issue. Make sure to optimise your video like you do with your images. Autoplaying video should be use for background video if your video isn't in background you should have control available so they can click play.
i switched to a gif approach for now
